item.title: Logos Ideas 2020
item.dc:creator: Nam Vũ
item.content:encoded:
As a designer, you’d often get asked by your friends and acquaintances for ‘small favors’ which mostly mean coming for 5-minute logos. Understandably, most senior designers hate this, I’m no exception.

But 2020 is a bizarre year, and like most people, I have a lot of spare 5-minute this year, which result in a few of these.

5-min logos aren’t given a lot of thought in term of brand direction and usability, rather they just need to be eye-catching and fit a very narrow range of use.

Client

Personal

Project Date

2020

Category

Logo/Branding

Share This

Bunbogu (文房具)

Japanese Stationery

FujiWon

Japanese - Korean import products
Visit FujiWon.com.vn

Lagumi

Cosmetic Products (FujiWon's sub-brand)

Visit lagumi.vn

Nash Torpedo

NashTech Gaming Clan
Text Layout Options
Final Team Promo Poster (Yes, I am aware the photo quality was shit, but it was taken with a cheap Android phone)

item.title: (2017) Wandering Dragon Game Elements
item.dc:creator: Nam Vũ
item.content:encoded:
Wandering Dragon Game Elements

Wandering Dragon is a vertical platformer inspired by Leap Day. It was one of the 3 game in Project Trinity.

I was only involved in the very early alpha stage of this game, created the game title and a few simple assets on the very first alpha version of the game.

Client

Punch Entertainment Vietnam

Project Date

2017

Category

Graphic Design · Logo/Branding · Mobile

Share This

item.title: (2018) DiChung.vn Mobile App Prototype
item.dc:creator: Nam Vũ
item.content:encoded:
Dichung.vn Mobile App (prototype)

A while ago I was approached by a person from Dichung.vn for the position of Lead UI/UX department. While I didn’t take the job, I find it intriguing to create a design for a mobile app version of their service (they don’t have a mobile presence yet)

Please note that this particular version is an unsolicited redesign

Client

Dichung.vn

Project Date

Aug 2018

Category

Graphic Design · Logo/Branding · Mobile · User Interfaces

Share This

item.dc:creator: Nam Vũ
item.content:encoded:
LARA Logo & Identity

LARA is a performance marketing DSP, a product of Omega Media Worldwide JSC.

The design is based off Omega Media’s existing identity, and was done in the same style, with the same typeface.

Client

item.title: (2018) Lợi Sữa Mộc Tiên
item.dc:creator: Nam Vũ
item.content:encoded:
Lợi Sữa Mộc Tiên

Lợi sữa Mộc Tiên 100% thảo dược 2018 được kế thừa từ bài thuốc bắc Mộc Tiên ra đời năm 2017 đã được hơn 50 000 bà mẹ sử dụng và gọi sữa về thành công

Loi Sua Moc Tien is a medicinal tea product aimed at mothers who want to increase their breast milk production naturally. This product can be widely found on the Vietnamese version of Shopee and on BIBABO’s ecommerce platform

Client

BIBABO

Project Date

2018

Category

Graphic Design · Logo/Branding · Printed Media

Share This

View Project

The Logos

Here’s some real photos of the end product taken by the client. the print lab screwed up the background a little bit, duplicating the mountain, by the time we realize it, 3000 labels had been printed, so I guess this is how it’s supposed to look now

item.title: (2017) Cosmo Squad (Slot Game)
item.dc:creator: Nam Vũ
item.content:encoded:
Phi Đội Không Gian (Slot Game)

Phi Đội Không Gian (aka Cosmo Squad) is a slot game with a space-themed interface. I was solely responsible for the creation of the game interface and logo. The illustrations of the characters and spaceships were done by my very talented friend Light-R Trang and Darth Chang.

Client

RikVIP

Project Date

Oct 2017

Category

Logo/Branding · Mobile · User Interfaces

Share This
